s.text: The campaign delivered hundreds of thousands of petitions to House members, swamped congressional switchboards with 250,000 calls, and won meetings with more than 200 representatives--all through what Boyd and Blades call "word of mouse."
According to Blades, Moveon will also add more candidates to its roster this winter and will begin trying to direct those who volunteered time to campaigns.
According to Blades, Moveon will also add more candidates to its roster this winter and will begin trying to direct those who volunteered time to campaigns.
Its success all but guarantees that other political movements will imitate Moveon's style of flash campaign, which far outstrips the sluggardly pace of direct mail.
Its success all but guarantees that other political movements will imitate Moveon's style of flash campaign, which far outstrips the sluggardly pace of direct mail.
Its success all but guarantees that other political movements will imitate Moveon's style of flash campaign, which far outstrips the sluggardly pace of direct mail.

It is easy to imagine that an Internet movement could spring up to oppose, for example, Vermont's gay-marriage ruling: A drive targeted at conservatives could collect thousands of electronic petitions in no time and solicit contributions for anti-gay marriage politicians.
